summary: This module supplies utility classes and helpers that adapt DeepSpeed components to the Accelerate framework. It wraps DeepSpeed's engine, optimizer, and scheduler to expose a conventional trainingâ€‘loop API, provides dummy optimizer and scheduler placeholders for configuration compatibility, and defines a configuration helper for DeepSpeed settings. A getter function retrieves the currently active DeepSpeed plugin.
business_intent: Enable seamless integration of DeepSpeed into Accelerate-powered training pipelines by abstracting DeepSpeed specifics behind a uniform interface, simplifying distributed training setup, and ensuring compatibility with standard training code even when only DeepSpeed configuration is supplied.
